page.title: 11CAUSHOUSE FARM, OLD BRAMPTON
page.content:
The farm we studied is called {Caushouse Farm}which is situated at Old Brampton. Mr David Simpson owns 72 acres; 65 are arable and 7 are grass. His land is sub-divided into 8 fields.
The 3 main products in which he deals are cereals, oilseed rape and beef as he also possesses approximately 20 cattle. Mr Simpson is only a tenant of the land.
His workforce consists of one male relative who helps permanently. During busy times Mr Simpson employs casual labour. The number of tractors that he owns is 2.
